joke: Why do programmers prefer dark mode? Because light attracts bugs.
I asked the AI to tell me a joke. It said: Have you heard the one about the chatbot who took a coffee break? It was unresponsive for 20 minutes.
My team's sprint planning meeting could have been an email. The email could have been a sticky note. The sticky note could have been silence.
A developer and a designer walk into a bar. The developer says: This place has great ambiance. The designer says: The kerning is terrible.
